# plant names using `names_list`

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

By default gets generic names, and returns 10 items

```{r}
names_list()
```

Get 5 species names

```{r}
names_list('species', 5)
```

Get 10 family names

```{r}
names_list('family', 10)
```
